titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain real property in the Dixie National Forest in the State of Utah.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health Discharged.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 107-665.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 408.

bill.summary: 9/23/2002--Reported to House amended. Directs: (1) the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in Utah to Kirk R. Harrison; and (2) that such proceeds shall be used to acquire lands and land interests for the Dixie National Forest, Utah.
